full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,KLU GTOR GDENGS CAN DGA' BSKYED MA BZHUGS S+HO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(SPYIR KLU GTOR NI @003B THEBS YOD MED LA BLTOS NA'ANG DPAL LDAN SA SKYA PA'I PHYAG LEN GYI DKAR CHA BZHI PA'I NING KLU GTOR RGYUN DU MDZAD CING PHAN YON CHE BAS, 'PHAGS PA RIN CHEN DANG RGYAL SRAS THOGS MED BZANG PO DPAL SOGS GONG MA RNAMS KYI YIG CHA NAS RJE SHAR KHANG PA SHES RAB RGYAL MTSAN GYIS GSAL BAR MDZAD PA'I YI GE LAS PHYUNG STE, RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I PHAN BDE LEGS BSHAD GLING PA'I RGYUN KHYER ZA HOR GYI BANDES BKOD PA'I YI GE PA NI GNAS PAN 'JAM DBYANGS SO, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
